results.t: Haunter Pokédex: stats, moves, evolution & locations

results.p: Haunter lurks, silently stalking its next victim. It likes to lurk in the dark and tap shoulders with a gaseous hand. Its touch causes endless shuddering.
Flavor Text. Sword, Its tongue is made of gas. If licked, its victim starts shaking constantly until death eventually comes.
A dual-type Ghost/Poison Pokémon, and is one of the official Pokémon featured in Pokémon Vega. It evolves from Gastly starting at level 24.

results.t: Why does it say my haunter has no evolution?
results.p: Haunter evolves into Gengar by using Link Cable on it. But you're right, that "No evolution." text on Haunter is wrong.
Haunter is an overall decent offensive threat, being able to serve as a wallbreaker with its Life Orb set or as a revenge killer with its Choice Scarf set.
Mar 1, 2024 — Haunter is a dual-type Ghost/Poison Pokémon. It evolves from Gastly starting at level 25 and evolves into Gengar when traded.
